name: Bunny Lovies
description:
•BUNNY LOVIE•

•ON SALE -- Reg. $25

•DESCRIPTION•
Soft and cuddly bunnies are perfect for naptime, playtime, hugging, chewing on and draggin around by the ears! Sweet modern cotton prints line the ears and soft cotton batting ups the squeezable factor. Simple design makes it safe for little ones. Bodies and the outside ears are made from the plushest minky for extreme cuddling! Add a carrot rattle for a perfect baby shower gift.

•DETAILS•
Includes 1 bunny!
Body measures approximately 10 inches high and 5 inches wide with 9 inch long ears.
Soft cotton minky fabrics body with cotton fabric lining the ears.
Stuffed with poly/cotton batting.
Wash in cold or warm water with a low heat / air dry.

•SHIPPING•
►This item ships via USPS First Class Mail.◄

Orders weighing less than 13oz will ship via USPS First Class Mail.
Single or combined orders weighing more than 13oz will ship via USPS Priority Mail.

name: Ruffled Changing Mat - Create Your Own
description:
•RUFFLED CHANGING MAT - CREATE YOUR OWN•

•DESCRIPTION•
We love this new changing mat!  These ruffles are the best way to brighten up the yucky task of diaper changing.   Generously sized and padded for maximum coverage and comfort!  Best of all, just roll it up, secure with the coordinating elastic band and throw it in your bag ... easy peasy!

•DETAILS•
Changing Mats measure approximately 26 x 18 when opened and 9" long when rolled.
Constructed with a quality cotton front, back and ruffle.
Lined with a layer of fleece batting for a comfy cushion.
Folds in half and rolls up for easy storage.
Brown elastic band for closure.
Wash in cold or warm water with a low heat dry.

•This is a Create Your Own listing so please be sure to leave me a note at checkout with the following info: 
Outside Fabric Choice (see fabric sheet) 
Inside Fabric Choice
Ruffle Color Choice (White, Soft Pink, Bright Pink, Yellow, Navy, Soft Blue, Black and Red)

•SHIPPING•
►This item ships flat via USPS First Class Mail.◄

Orders weighing less than 13oz will ship via USPS First Class Mail.
Single or combined orders weighing more than 13oz will ship via USPS Priority Mail.

name: Quick Trip Diaper Bag Organizer - Create Your Own
description:
•QUICK TRIP ORGANIZER•

•DESCRIPTION• 
Better than a seperate changing mat and diaper/wipes holder...this is all-in-one! Folds up to a nice clutch size and unfolds to reveal a pouch for holding diapers/wipes as well as a mat for changing baby!  Lightly padded for babies comfort but not too bulky for your bag.

•DETAILS• 
Folded organizer measures approximately 14" x 9" with a velcro closure. Pouch has room to hold multiple diapers, cream and a wipes container. 
Wash in cold or warm water with a low heat / air dry.

•This is a Create Your Own listing so please be sure to leave me a note at checkout with the following info: 
Outside Fabric Choice (see fabric sheet in the picture section) 
Inside Fabric Choice

•SHIPPING• 
►This item ships via USPS First Class Mail.◄

Orders weighing less than 13oz will ship via USPS First Class Mail. 
Single or combined orders weighing more than 13oz will ship via USPS Priority Mail.

name: Giraffe Teether
description:
•GIRAFFE TEETHER•

•DESCRIPTION•
Sweet little giraffe teethers in bold prints make for tons of gentle fun for your little one. Soft cotton fabric bodies are easy for baby to grip, shake and chew. Soft ribbon loop ears and tail make for a fun distraction too! Mix and match with a Ruffled Changing Mat or Burp Cloth Set for a perfect baby shower gift.

•DETAILS•
Includes 1 giraffe.
Measures approximately 10 inches high and 4 inches wide.
Soft cotton fabric outer shell.
Stuffed with poly/cotton batting.
Wash in cold or warm water with a low heat / air dry.

•SHIPPING•
►This item ships via USPS First Class Mail.◄

Orders weighing less than 13oz will ship via USPS First Class Mail.
Single or combined orders weighing more than 13oz will ship via USPS Priority Mail.

Roll Ups are real multi-taskers in the land of baby ...
Changing Mat
Tummy Time
